DOC.brief_summary: This descriptive prospective community-based seroprevalence study . Primary objective : - To determine prevalence specific antibody ( immunoglobulin G [ IgG ] ) dengue healthy 5 10 year-old child India . Secondary objective : - To determine dengue virus serotype ( DeNV-1,2,3 /or 4 ) specific antibody positive ( IgG ) sample - To estimate prevalence specific antibody ( IgG ) Japanese encephalitis healthy 5 10 year-old child India .
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Dengue Seroprevalence Study 5 10 Year-old Children
DOC.criteria: Aged 5 10 yearold day inclusion Healthy child report parent legally qualify guardian Being register select study site Provision inform consent form sign least one parent legally qualify guardian For child 8 10 year old , provision assent form sign .
